title: S&P Futures Tick Lower Ahead of FOMC Meeting and U.S. Economic Data
content: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH25) are trending down -0.19% this morning as investors await the start of the Federal Reserve‚Äôs two-day policy meeting and a fresh batch of U.S. economic data. In yesterday‚Äôs trading session, Wall Street‚Äôs major indexes ended in the green. Intel (INTC) climbed over +6% and was the top percentage gainer on the Nasdaq 100 after Reuters reported that incoming CEO Lip-Bu Tan was considering significant changes to the company‚Äôs chip manufacturing methods and AI strategies. Also, Netflix (NFLX) rose more than +3% after MoffettNathanson upgraded the stock to Buy from Neutral with a price target of $1,100. In addition, Science Applications International Corp. (SAIC) gained over +7% after the information technology company posted better-than-expected Q4 results and raised its full-year guidance. On the bearish side, Tesla (TSLA) slid more than -4% and was the top percentage loser on the Nasdaq 100 after Chinese rival BYD Co. introduced a new electric vehicle system capable of charging a car in just five minutes. Economic data released on Monday showed that U.S. retail sales crept up +0.2% m/m in February, weaker than expectations of +0.6% m/m. Also, U.S. February core retail sales, which exclude motor vehicles and parts, rose +0.3% m/m, in line with expectations. In addition, the Empire State manufacturing index tumbled to a 14-month low of -20.00 in March, weaker than expectations of -1.90. ‚Äú[Yesterday‚Äôs] February retail sales report offers evidence of a limited, modest economic slowdown, rather than signaling a gathering recession,‚Äù said Jennifer Timmerman at Wells Fargo Investment Institute. The Federal Reserve kicks off its two-day meeting later in the day. The U.S. central bank is widely expected to hold the Fed funds rate steady at 4.25% to 4.50% on Wednesday. The decision comes amid growing concerns about the potential damage that U.S. President Donald Trump‚Äôs tariff policies could inflict on the economy. Market watchers will closely follow Chair Jerome Powell‚Äôs post-policy meeting press conference and the central bank‚Äôs quarterly ‚Äúdot plot‚Äù in its Summary of Economic Projections for clues on the path ahead. Economists expect policymakers‚Äô updated projections to indicate two quarter-percentage-point cuts this year. On the economic data front, investors will focus on U.S. Building Permits (preliminary) and Housing Starts data. Economists expect February Building Permits to be 1.450M and Housing Starts to be 1.380M, compared to the prior figures of 1.473M and 1.366M, respectively. U.S. Industrial Production and Manufacturing Production data will also be closely monitored today. Economists forecast February Industrial Production at +0.2% m/m and Manufacturing Production at +0.3% m/m, compared to January‚Äôs figures of +0.5% m/m and -0.1% m/m, respectively. U.S. Export and Import Price Indexes will be released today as well. Economists anticipate the export price index to be -0.2% m/m and the import price index to be -0.1% m/m in February, compared to the previous figures of +1.3% m/m and +0.3% m/m, respectively. In the bond market, the yield on the benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasury note is at 4.320%, up +0.33%. The Euro Stoxx 50 Index is up +0.85% this morning, tracking gains in Asia, as investors continue shifting toward non-U.S. assets amid uncertainties triggered by U.S. President Donald Trump. Automobile and energy stocks outperformed on Tuesday. The ZEW Economic Research Institute reported on Tuesday that German investor morale improved more than expected in March, hitting the highest level since February 2022, as the country‚Äôs lawmakers neared a deal to boost spending on defense and infrastructure. Meanwhile, investors are awaiting a key vote in the German parliament on historic debt reforms. Germany‚Äôs lower house of parliament is scheduled to vote today on a proposed significant increase in state borrowing to finance a surge in defense and infrastructure spending, which could boost Europe‚Äôs largest economy and support growth across the region. Investors will also closely monitor the outcome of a phone call between President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin later today, as the U.S. president seeks to persuade his counterpart to agree to a ceasefire in Russia‚Äôs three-year war with Ukraine. In corporate news, Befesa SA (BFSA.D.DX) climbed over +3%, extending yesterday‚Äôs gains after Bloomberg News reported that buyout firm Triton Partners had built a stake in the recycling company. European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn said on Tuesday that trade uncertainty is pressuring the European economy in the short term, and any benefits from increased defense investment will take time to materialize, suggesting the central bank may need to keep cutting rates. Germany‚Äôs ZEW Economic Sentiment Index, Eurozone‚Äôs ZEW Economic Sentiment Index, and Eurozone‚Äôs Trade Balance were released today. The German March ZEW Economic Sentiment Index stood at 51.6, stronger than expectations of 48.1. Eurozone January Trade Balance came in at 1.0B euros, weaker than expectations of 14.0B euros. Eurozone March ZEW Economic Sentiment Index arrived at 39.8, weaker than expectations of 43.6. Asian stock markets today closed in the green. China‚Äôs Shanghai Composite Index (SHCOMP) closed up +0.11%, and Japan‚Äôs Nikkei 225 Stock Index (NIK) closed up +1.20%. China‚Äôs Shanghai Composite Index closed slightly higher today. Home appliance and pharmaceutical stocks led the gains on Tuesday. Over the weekend, China unveiled a special action plan aimed at boosting consumption, a top policy priority for Beijing. However, a scheduled policy briefing on Monday, where authorities were expected to unveil details about efforts to stimulate consumption, failed to provide new catalysts. An official at the briefing said that China‚Äôs central bank is examining plans to create new structural monetary policy tools to enhance low-cost financial support for key consumption sectors. Also, Li Chunlin, deputy chief of the National Development and Reform Commission, noted that consumer confidence and demand remain weak. Meanwhile, HSBC raised its 2025 GDP growth forecast for China to 4.8% from 4.5%, citing stronger policy support from Beijing to boost domestic consumption and robust economic activity data for the first two months. The bank also upgraded its 2026 forecast to 4.5% from 4.4%. In other news, U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that Chinese leader Xi Jinping would soon visit Washington, as trade tensions between the world‚Äôs two largest economies continue to escalate. In corporate news, WuXi AppTec surged over +10% in Hong Kong after announcing a special dividend and share buyback plan. Also, BYD Co. gained more than +4% in Hong Kong after the Chinese automaker introduced a new lineup of electric vehicles, claiming they can charge nearly as quickly as refueling a regular car. Japan‚Äôs Nikkei 225 Stock Index closed higher and hit an almost 3-week high today, tracking overnight gains on Wall Street. Trading firms jumped on Tuesday after Warren Buffett‚Äôs Berkshire Hathaway boosted its stakes in the country‚Äôs largest trading houses, reinforcing expectations of longer-term growth prospects. Financial stocks also gained ground. The benchmark index briefly surpassed the 38,000 level for the first time since February 27th but struggled to hold above it as investors remained cautious about the market outlook. Meanwhile, Japan‚Äôs 10-year government bond yield rose on Tuesday, reversing earlier declines as investors braced for the Bank of Japan‚Äôs monetary policy decision. The BOJ is widely expected to keep its policy rate unchanged at 0.5% on Wednesday. Investors will look for clues on the timing of the central bank‚Äôs next rate hike during Governor Kazuo Ueda‚Äôs post-meeting press conference. In corporate news, IR Japan rose over +3% after the company projected FY25 sales of 5.7 billion yen and announced plans for a 20-yen dividend. The Nikkei Volatility Index, which takes into account the implied volatility of Nikkei 225 options, closed down -4.03% to 22.84. Pre-Market U.S. Stock Movers Harrow Health (HROW) soared over +23% in pre-market trading after the company reported better-than-expected preliminary Q4 revenue. Grab Holdings (GRAB) climbed more than +6% in pre-market trading after Bloomberg reported that the ride-hailing and food-delivery giant was moving forward with its attempt to take over Indonesian rival GoTo. Ralph Lauren (RL) gained over +3% in pre-market trading after Goldman Sachs upgraded the stock to Buy from Neutral with a price target of $286. Block (XYZ) rose more than +1% in pre-market trading after Keefe Bruyette upgraded the stock to Outperform from Market Perform. PepsiCo (PEP) fell over -1% in pre-market trading after Barclays downgraded the stock to Equal Weight from Overweight. You can see more pre-market stock movers here Today‚Äôs U.S. Earnings Spotlight: Tuesday - March 18th Ke Hldg (BEKE), Tencent Music Entertainment Group (TME), Elbit Systems (ESLT), ZTO Express Cayman (ZTO), Healthequity (HQY), GDS Holdings (GDS), StoneCo (STNE), Lexinfintech (LX), Up Fintech (TIGR), IHS Holding (IHS), HUYA (HUYA), Trevi Therapeutics (TRVI), SNDL Inc (SNDL), Absci (ABSI), Waldencast Acquisition (WALD), Maravai Lifesciences (MRVI), Citi Trends (CTRN). On the date of publication, Oleksandr Pylypenko did not have (either directly or indirectly) positions in any of the securities mentioned in this article. All information and data in this article is solely for informational purposes. For more information please view the Barchart Disclosure Policy here.

title: ‚ÄòGrab the Bull by the Horns,‚Äô Says Investor About Ripple (XRP)
content: Discover stocks' market position with detailed competitor analyses. As usual, Bitcoin‚Äôs (BTC) tumble from its January high has been accompanied by even steeper losses in other tokens. Ripple (XRP), for instance ‚Äì one of the biggest winners following Trump‚Äôs election victory ‚Äì has retreated 32% from its January peak. The question for investors is whether the current retreat signals the end of the bull run or represents just a breather, with coins poised to soon gain momentum once again. For one investor, known by the pseudonym Practical Crypto Capital (PCC), the answer is clear ‚Äì especially when it comes to XRP. ‚ÄúBull markets are wild and unpredictable with short-term booms and busts. The rational investor does not let the volatility scare them out of their positions.‚Äù PCC says. ‚ÄúDespite the major pullback in crypto during February and March, my thesis remains intact ‚Äì XRP is still a buy. In fact, there‚Äôs been additional industry and Ripple-specific news to support this.‚Äù One key factor PCC highlights is the growing institutional interest in XRP, evidenced by nine institutions filing applications for an XRP ETF. While the SEC has delayed decisions on multiple ETFs, Bloomberg ETF analyst James Seyffart noted that these postponements are routine and unlikely to impact their eventual approval. It is likely that the SEC is holding off on these approvals until Paul Atkins, the incoming SEC chairman, officially takes office. ‚ÄúOnce approved, these products will enable both retail and institutional investors easy access to allocate funds to XRP,‚Äù PCC notes. Meanwhile, stablecoins ‚Äúcontinue to be the killer apps‚Äù in the cryptosphere and Ripple has gotten in on the action. It introduced its own stablecoin, RLUSD, in December and its market cap has since surpassed $169 million. There‚Äôs also the technical perspective with PCC claiming the long-term chart ‚Äúreveals the truth.‚Äù Despite the recent pullback, XRP remains firmly in ‚Äúbreakout territory‚Äù after overcoming its lengthy four-year triangle pattern. All the above is enough to convince PCC the bull market has a way to go yet. ‚ÄúXRP is still well above where it‚Äôs been trading for most of the past 4 years, and there is good news in the form of ETFs and the stablecoin,‚Äù the investor summed up. ‚ÄúWhen the macroeconomic tariff fears are finally resolved, we‚Äôll see a continuation of the bull market well into 2025.‚Äù To find good ideas for stocks trading at attractive valuations, visit TipRanks‚Äô Best Stocks to Buy, a tool that unites all of TipRanks‚Äô equity insights. Disclaimer: The opinions expressed in this article are solely those of the featured investor. The content is intended to be used for informational purposes only. It is very important to do your own analysis before making any investment.Questions or Comments about the article? Write to editor@tipranks.com

title: Deals in Brief: Grab reportedly in GoTo takeover talks, Kyberlife and Bluesify raise funding, Fore Coffee targets Indonesia IPO, and more
content: Grab reportedly in GoTo takeover discussions Grab, the Singapore-based tech giant, is reportedly progressing in its efforts to acquire Indonesian rival GoTo Group, having begun due diligence on the firm, according to Bloomberg. Sources familiar with the matter told the US media outlet that Grab is reviewing GoTo‚Äôs financials, contracts, and operations as both companies and their shareholders explore deal structures and valuations. While discussions are ongoing, a transaction is not assured. Regulatory scrutiny presents a major obstacle, as a combined Grab-GoTo entity would control an estimated 60‚Äì70% of Southeast Asia‚Äôs on-demand services market. A previous deal attempt was stalled by antitrust concerns, echoing the unsuccessful acquisition of Singapore‚Äôs Trans-Cab by Grab. The valuation under discussion for GoTo reportedly exceeds USD 7 billion, with a potential all-stock transaction priced at over IDR 100 (USD 0.006) per share. Earlier this month, GoTo announced that it had surpassed its breakeven guidance for full-year 2024 financial results, despite concerns about slowing growth amid inflationary pressures and high interest rates. Following reports of merger discussions, GoTo reiterated on March 19 that no agreement has been reached regarding a potential transaction. Kyberlife secures USD 3 million to digitize healthcare procurement Kyberlife, a Singapore-based health tech startup, has raised USD 3 million in an investment round led by 5I Ventures, with participation from East Ventures, A2D Ventures, and NUS Alumni Ventures. The company operates a B2B e-commerce marketplace that streamlines procurement for healthcare institutions and research labs in Southeast Asia. The funding will support Kyberlife‚Äôs expansion into Indonesia and its goal of connecting local healthcare institutions with global suppliers. The company also plans to introduce new product categories, including laboratory instruments and chemical reagents, to enhance pharmaceutical R&D in the region. Photo of Kyberlife‚Äôs team, courtesy of the company. Ekuinas invests in Bluesify to bolster Malaysia‚Äôs cybersecurity sector Bluesify Solutions, a managed security services provider, has secured an investment from Ekuiti Nasional Berhad (Ekuinas), a private equity firm linked to the Malaysian government. The financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. Founded in 2012, Bluesify provides cybersecurity services to financial institutions, energy firms, healthcare providers, and government entities. The investment will enable the company to scale its managed detection and response (MDR) center and expand across Southeast Asia. Ekuinas sees the deal as an opportunity to tap into Southeast Asia‚Äôs expanding cybersecurity market, which it projects to reach USD 7.1 billion by 2029. Fore Coffee targets USD 23 million in Indonesia IPO Fore Coffee, an Indonesian coffee chain, is preparing for an IPO on the Indonesia Stock Exchange, aiming to raise up to IDR 379.76 billion (USD 23 million). The offering consists of up to 1.88 billion new shares, representing 21.08% of the company‚Äôs enlarged share capital. The indicative price range is set at IDR 160‚Äì202 (USD 0.0097‚Äì0.0122) per share. The bookbuilding period runs from March 19‚Äì21, with public subscription scheduled from March 26 to April 9. Shares are expected to debut on April 11. Fore Coffee operates a network of outlets across Indonesia and is positioning itself as a premium coffee brand, targeting the country‚Äôs growing cafe culture. The company plans to use IPO proceeds to fund expansion, digital enhancements, and operational improvements. RedotPay raises USD 40 million to scale crypto payments RedotPay, a Hong Kong-based crypto payment firm, has raised USD 40 million in a Series A funding round led by Lightspeed, with participation from HSG, Galaxy Ventures, DST Global Partners, Accel, and Vertex Ventures. The company integrates traditional payment infrastructure with cryptocurrencies, allowing users to conduct everyday transactions using digital assets. The funding will support RedotPay‚Äôs product roadmap, regulatory compliance efforts, and global expansion. ‚ÄúOur team takes pride in empowering millions globally with financial access while bridging the gap between fiat and crypto,‚Äù said Michael Gao, co-founder and CEO of RedotPay. Mito Health secures additional USD 2.2 million, expands longevity research Mito Health, a longevity-focused health tech company, has raised an additional USD 2.2 million in seed funding, bringing its total funding to USD 4 million. The round saw participation from Y Combinator, Capital X, XA Network, and angel investors including Balaji Srinivasan and Nir Eyal. Since its launch, Mito Health has expanded across the US, offering comprehensive blood testing and health analysis services. The company‚Äôs platform focuses on early detection of health risks and deficiencies. The new funds will be used to further develop its artificial intelligence-powered analytics and expand partnerships with diagnostic firms. Alphabet to acquire cybersecurity firm Wiz for USD 32 billion Alphabet, Google‚Äôs parent company, has reportedly confirmed plans to acquire cybersecurity startup Wiz for USD 32 billion, according to Reuters. Wiz will integrate with Google Cloud, strengthening Alphabet‚Äôs security offerings as it competes with Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure. The deal underscores Alphabet‚Äôs commitment to cybersecurity and is expected to close in 2026, pending regulatory approval. However, it is likely to face scrutiny, particularly regarding competition in cloud security. Alphabet has stated that Wiz‚Äôs products will remain available on rival platforms to address potential concerns. Alphabet previously made an unsuccessful USD 23 billion bid to acquire Wiz. RELATED ARTICLE NewsDeals in brief: Binance secures investment from MGX, Amber International debuts on Nasdaq, latest China deals, and more Written by KrASIA Writers Binance, Amber International, Insilico, and more made recent headlines: Binance, the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange, received a USD 2 billion investment from Abu Dhabi-based technology investor MGX. Amber International, a Web3 financial solutions and infrastructure provider, began trading on Nasdaq under the ticker ‚ÄúAMBR‚Äù following its merger with iClick Interactive Asia Group. Insilico Medicine, a drug discovery company, secured USD 110 million in an oversubscribed Series E funding round led by Value Partners Group, with support from new industry and technology-focused investors. Existing backers also participated in the round. If there are any news or updates you‚Äôd like us to feature, get in touch with us at: [email protected]. Share

title: Omnichannel Strategies in Thai Restaurants: Integrating Online Ordering and Delivery
content: Introduction The food industry has seen a significant shift towards digital channels in recent years, with more customers opting for online ordering and delivery services. Thai restaurants, in particular, have embraced omnichannel strategies to cater to the changing preferences of their customers. In this report, we will explore how Thai restaurants are integrating online ordering and delivery into their operations to enhance customer experience and drive sales. Current Landscape of Thai Restaurants in Thailand Thai cuisine is known for its bold flavors and fresh ingredients, making it a popular choice for diners around the world. In Thailand, the restaurant industry is highly competitive, with a wide range of dining options available to consumers. Thai restaurants vary from street food stalls to high-end establishments, catering to a diverse range of customers. Benefits of Omnichannel Strategies in Thai Restaurants Omnichannel strategies allow Thai restaurants to reach a wider audience and provide convenience to their customers. By integrating online ordering and delivery services, restaurants can streamline the ordering process, reduce wait times, and increase customer satisfaction. Additionally, omnichannel strategies enable restaurants to collect valuable data on customer preferences and behavior, allowing them to tailor their offerings to meet the needs of their target audience. Financial Impact of Omnichannel Strategies According to industry data, Thai restaurants that have implemented omnichannel strategies have seen a significant increase in sales and revenue. By offering online ordering and delivery services, restaurants can tap into new revenue streams and expand their customer base. In 2020, the online food delivery market in Thailand was valued at $1.2 billion, with a projected annual growth rate of 8.5%. Case Study: Example Thai Restaurant Implementing Omnichannel Strategies One example of a Thai restaurant that has successfully implemented omnichannel strategies is ‚ÄúThai Delight.‚Äù This restaurant offers online ordering through their website and mobile app, as well as delivery services through third-party platforms such as GrabFood and Foodpanda. By providing multiple channels for customers to place orders, Thai Delight has been able to increase their sales and improve customer satisfaction. Challenges and Considerations While omnichannel strategies offer numerous benefits to Thai restaurants, there are also challenges to consider. Restaurants must invest in technology and infrastructure to support online ordering and delivery services, which can be costly. Additionally, managing multiple channels can be complex and require additional staff training. However, the potential benefits of omnichannel strategies far outweigh the challenges, making it a worthwhile investment for Thai restaurants looking to stay competitive in the digital age. Future Trends in Omnichannel Strategies for Thai Restaurants Looking ahead, the future of omnichannel strategies in Thai restaurants is promising. With advancements in technology and changing consumer preferences, restaurants will continue to innovate and find new ways to engage with their customers. Virtual kitchens, AI-driven personalization, and contactless delivery are just some of the trends that we can expect to see in the coming years. In conclusion, omnichannel strategies play a crucial role in the success of Thai restaurants in today‚Äôs digital landscape. By integrating online ordering and delivery services, restaurants can enhance customer experience, increase sales, and stay ahead of the competition. As the industry continues to evolve, Thai restaurants that embrace omnichannel strategies will be well-positioned for long-term success.

title: Cara Bayar MRT Jakarta Pakai QRIS Tap di Aplikasi Gopay
content: Liputan6.com, Jakarta - -- Bayar pakai HP kini semakin mudah dengan GoPay QRIS Tap . Fitur terbaru dari GoPay ini memungkinkan pengguna untuk bertransaksi non-tunai hanya dengan menempelkan smartphone mereka ke mesin EDC yang mendukung NFC. Cara pembayaran ini memanfaatkan teknologi NFC dan standar QRIS, sehingga transaksi cepat, aman, dan terintegrasi dengan ekosistem GoPay. Baca Juga BI Tasikmalaya Sediakan Penukaran Uang Tunai hingga Rp1,8 Triliun, Cek Lokasi Penukarannya GoPay QRIS Tap merupakan inovasi dari GoPay, unit bisnis Financial Technology PT GoTo Gojek Tokopedia, yang mendukung program pemerintah untuk meningkatkan transaksi digital di Indonesia. Advertisement Sesuai dengan Blueprint Sistem Pembayaran Indonesia (BSPI) 2030 dari Bank Indonesia, QRIS Tap dirancang untuk mempercepat transaksi pembayaran, terutama untuk transportasi umum, ritel, UMKM, dan parkir. Head of GoPay Wallet Kelvin Timotius, mengatakan, ‚ÄúGoPay terus berinovasi untuk memberikan teknologi terdepan yang akan memudahkan pengguna dalam bertransaksinon-tunai. Harapannya, pengguna kami juga semakin mendapat banyak pilihan bertransaksinon-tunai dengan mudah dan aman." Ia berharap, inovasi QRIS Tap bisa mendukung Bank Indonesia mendorong digitalisasi pembayaran. Sebagai informasi, Gopay juga turut serta menguji coba secara terbatas pembayaran MRT Jakarta melalui QRIS Tap. Berdasarkan keterangan Gopay, Rabu (19/3/2025), metode pembayaran QRIS Tap menjadi salah satu opsi pembayaran tiket MRT Jakarta diujicobakan secara terbatas di MRT Jakarta selama satu bulan. Adapun opsi pembayaran tiket melalui QRIS Tap di MRT Jakarta saat ini hanya berlaku untuk rute perjalanan Bundaran HI-Lebak Bulus atau sebaliknya.

title: ComfortDelGro Launches Robotaxi Pilot in Guangzhou in Partnership with Pony.ai
content: Singapore-based transport giant ComfortDelGro has officially launched its first robotaxi pilot programme in Guangzhou, China, marking a significant step toward the commercial adoption of autonomous ride-hailing services. The two-year pilot, introduced on March 17, is being conducted in collaboration with Pony.ai, a leading autonomous driving technology firm. Pony.ai has previously spearheaded autonomous driving initiatives in countries such as South Korea, Luxembourg, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE. https://t.co/dLOXbFzHam and ComfortDelGro officially launched their joint autonomous driving ride-hailing service in Guangzhou on March 12. Following their 2024 MOU, this partnership aims to expand #robotaxi operations across China and beyond. https://t.co/KeUCxJ0JmIpic.twitter.com/YNxOwCTlC0‚Äî National Business Daily (@NBDPress) March 17, 2025 ComfortDelGro and Pony.ai formalized their partnership in July last year, with the aim of scaling up robotaxi operations.‚ÄúThis pilot programme represents a major milestone in commercializing autonomous taxi services. The initiative will allow us to develop and refine our capabilities in autonomous vehicle operations and fleet management, paving the way for future large-scale deployments in China and beyond.‚Äù ComfortDelGro revealed that they will initially focus on the trial on a small fleet of Lexus RX450 vehicles, before other vehicle models are introduced over the course of programme. ComfortDelGro has been actively investing in autonomous vehicle technology. In 2022, the company launched its Autonomous Vehicle Centre of Excellence, a S$30 million (US$22.5 million) initiative dedicated to enhancing autonomous vehicle operations and fleet management expertise. According to ComfortDelGro‚Äôs Managing Director and Group CEO, Cheng Siak Kian, autonomous technology is crucial for ensuring the long-term sustainability of the transport industry.‚ÄúWith global driver shortages becoming a persistent challenge, we are exploring innovative solutions to maintain accessible and efficient mobility. Autonomous vehicles can complement human drivers, improving ride availability during off-peak hours and in underserved areas.‚Äù Strategic collaboration for global expansion Pony.ai‚Äôs Chief Financial Officer, Leo Wang, emphasized that strategic partnerships are essential for expanding autonomous mobility services worldwide.‚ÄúTo achieve large-scale deployment, we need strong partners to support our global expansion. ComfortDelGro‚Äôs extensive experience in large-scale fleet management makes them an ideal collaborator, and we are confident that both teams will learn and grow together through this partnership.‚Äù This latest initiative signals a strong push toward autonomous transport solutions, with ComfortDelGro and Pony.ai working together to shape the future of urban mobility. title: Singapore Stocks May Face Pressure Amid Cautious Sentiment
content: The Singapore stock market may see a muted session on Wednesday, following two consecutive days of gains that added nearly 60 points or 1.6% to the Straits Times Index (STI). The index closed at 3,894.97 on Tuesday, just below the 3,900-point level, driven by financial and industrial stocks. However, global sentiment remains cautious ahead of the US Federal Reserve's policy decision. Wall Street ended lower overnight, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average down 0.62%, the Nasdaq Composite falling 1.71%, and the S&P 500 slipping 1.07%. Concerns over US trade policies and economic growth also weighed on markets. On Tuesday, Genting Singapore led gains, surging 2.68%, followed by Hongkong Land (+2.53%) and Seatrium Limited (+2.83%). Among banks, DBS Group and Oversea-Chinese Banking Corporation (OCBC) both rose 1.51%, while ComfortDelGro advanced 1.42%. Meanwhile, CapitaLand Integrated Commercial Trust fell 0.94%, Keppel DC REIT dropped 0.91%, and SingTel declined 0.59%. With Asian markets expected to follow Wall Street's weak lead, the STI may struggle to maintain its recent momentum, with investors likely to remain cautious ahead of key economic signals from the Fed. title: Ryde Integrates Alipay to Enhance Travel Convenience for International Visitors in Singapore
content: SINGAPORE, SG / ACCESS Newswire / March 18, 2025 / Ryde Group Ltd (NYSE American:RYDE) ('Ryde'' or the 'Company') , a technology company with a leading platform for mobility and quick commerce in Singapore, has integrated Alipay to provide a seamless payment experience for international visitors. International tourists visiting Singapore can now enjoy a smoother and more familiar ride-hailing experience, thanks to Ryde's latest integration of Alipay , one of China's most widely used digital payment platforms. The move comes as Chinese arrivals to Singapore reached 3.08 million in 2024 , a 126% year-on-year increase , accounting for 18.7% of all inbound arrivals . Singapore also achieved a historic high in tourism receipts in 2024, underscoring the growing demand for frictionless payment solutions . By offering Alipay as a payment option, Ryde removes a common inconvenience for International travellers-the reliance on cash or foreign credit cards-allowing them to navigate Singapore with greater ease. This enhancement benefits Alipay's 1.6 billion global users , enabling them to book rides seamlessly while visiting the country. Seamless Payments, Hassle-Free Travel With the new Alipay integration, International tourists using Ryde can now: Link their Alipay accounts for instant, secure transactions. Pay in RMB with transparent pricing. Enjoy a faster, cashless experience while exploring the city. For International travelers, this means more time soaking in the sights and less time worrying about payment logistics. Singapore's Top Attractions Now More Accessible Singapore continues to be a key destination for International visitors, with must-see attractions ranging from cultural landmarks to world-class leisure spots. With Ryde, tourists can seamlessly reach places like: Bird Paradise in Mandai - Asia's largest bird park, home to over 3,500 birds across 400 species. Maxwell Food Centre & Newton Food Centre - Famous for Singaporean staples like Hainanese chicken rice and chili crab. Singapore Zoo & River Wonders - A chance to meet pandas and experience the Night Safari. Marina Bay Sands & Gardens by the Bay - Iconic skyline views and lush futuristic gardens. Sentosa & East Coast Park - From thrilling rides at Universal Studios to relaxing beachfront getaways. A Competitive Move in Singapore's Ride-Hailing Market The Alipay partnership not only enhances the user experience but also strengthens Ryde's position in Singapore's competitive ride-hailing industry. The integration is expected to: A) Attract more Chinese tourists, a high-spending travel segment. B) Increase ride bookings, removing payment friction as a barrier. C) Boost transaction value, as tourists often take longer trips to key attractions. D) Open doors for future fintech collaborations, strengthening Ryde's ecosystem. Bridging the Gap for International Visitors James Tan, Director of Product of Ryde Group, shared 'Singapore stands as a premier destination for international travelers, and our goal is to make their experience effortless and enjoyable. By integrating Alipay into Ryde, we are not only elevating user convenience but also unlocking greater booking potential from this valuable travel segment. This integration eliminates a common travel hassle, empowering visitors to book rides with the same ease and familiarity they enjoy at home.' For now, Alipay payments will be available exclusively to verified Mainland China Alipay users, ensuring a seamless experience tailored to Ryde's growing Chinese customer base. A Step Forward in Travel Convenience With Alipay payments now live, Ryde continues to position itself as the go-to ride-hailing platform for international travelers in Singapore. For Chinese visitors, this latest update means one less hurdle when navigating the Lion City. About Ryde Group Ltd Ryde, a homegrown super mobility app founded in Singapore, is the world's FIRST on-demand carpooling app since 2014! As a publicly listed company on the NYSE, we are reimagining the way people and goods move around. We offer a full suite of services, including carpooling, private hire, taxi, and delivery, but what truly sets us apart is our commitment to empower our private-hire and taxi partners. We take 0% commission, ensuring that more of every hard-earned dollar goes to drivers on our platform. For more information, please visit https://rydesharing.com/ to learn more. title: Tren Baru Ramadan, Sahur Sambil Checkout Belanja Online! Ini Barang yang Paling Diburu!
content: bacakoran.co - kini jadi rutinitas baru saat sahur. fenomena "sahur sambil checkout" semakin populer selama 2025, di mana banyak pengguna e-commerce memanfaatkan waktu sahur untuk berburu berbagai produk. menurut aditia grasio nelwan, head of communication tokopedia & tiktok e-commerce, tren ini membuat transaksi melonjak hingga 10 kali lipat hanya dalam enam hari pertama ramadan (1-6 maret 2025). produk paling laris saat sahur barang-barang yang paling banyak dibeli saat sahur antara lain busana muslim wanita, hampers ramadan, dan produk kecantikan. ‚Äúwaktu sahur ternyata jadi momen paling krusial bagi pembeli untuk bertransaksi di tokopedia dan tiktok shop,‚Äù ungkap aditia. kolaborasi tokopedia & tiktok shop buat penjualan meledak lonjakan transaksi ini juga tak lepas dari kerja sama pemasaran antara tokopedia dan tiktok shop, yang memanfaatkan strategi integrated sales handle. bahkan, jumlah pesanan para penjual di kedua platform ini meningkat hingga dua kali lipat, dengan beberapa kategori produk mengalami kenaikan 10 kali lipat. hal ini juga sejalan dengan peningkatan jumlah pelaku usaha. melissa siska juminto, president director tokopedia & tiktok e-commerce mengungkapkan, jumlah seller di tiktok shop naik 40 persen menjelang ramadan. tiktok ramadan 2025: 72 juta video, 2 miliar views! menurut anggini setiawan dari tiktok indonesia, selama ramadan 72 juta video diunggah oleh kreator dan seller, ditonton lebih dari 2 miliar kali. nah, terdapat lima tagar tren paling populer di tiktok, yaitu #bukber, #ramadancore, #takjilramadan, #menubukapuasa, dan #berkahramadhan.

title: Pinjam Saldo DANA Rp50 Ribu Tanpa KTP? Ini Cara Cepat dan Mudahnya!
content: pinjam saldo dana rp50 ribu tanpa ktp? ini cara cepat dan mudahnya! sumateraekspres.id ‚Äì di tengah kebutuhan finansial yang mendesak, tidak semua orang memiliki dokumen seperti ktp untuk mengajukan pinjaman. namun, saat ini ada beberapa aplikasi yang memungkinkan kamu mendapatkan saldo dana sebesar rp50 ribu tanpa perlu melampirkan ktp. baca juga:banyuasin alihkan honorer non database ke sistem outsourcing baca juga:banjir terendam lima hari, warga talang jambi menanti solusi dari pemerintah berikut adalah berbagai cara yang dapat kamu coba untuk mendapatkan dana darurat tanpa ribet. fitur ‚Äúminta saldo‚Äù di aplikasi dana aplikasi dana memiliki fitur unggulan bernama "minta saldo", yang memungkinkan pengguna untuk meminta saldo dari teman atau keluarga tanpa membutuhkan dokumen tambahan. berikut cara menggunakan fitur tersebut: - buka aplikasi dana dan pilih menu "minta". - masukkan jumlah saldo yang ingin diminta (misalnya rp50 ribu). - bagikan link permintaan saldo ke teman atau keluarga melalui whatsapp, telegram, atau media sosial lainnya. - tunggu hingga saldo dikirim ke akunmu. fitur ini sangat memudahkan, terutama bagi yang sudah memiliki teman atau keluarga yang menggunakan aplikasi dana. baca juga:kito pacak! sriwijaya fc rekrut 12 pemain baru dan incar bintang senior untuk liga 2, ini nama-namanya! baca juga:polres lahat tingkatkan pengamanan jelang libur panjang dan arus mudik balik aplikasi penghasil saldo dana jika kamu ingin mendapatkan saldo dana tanpa menggunakan ktp, ada beberapa aplikasi penghasil uang yang dapat memberikan imbalan berupa saldo dana. aplikasi seperti snack video, buzzbreak, dan cashpop menawarkan cara untuk mendapatkan poin yang dapat ditukar dengan saldo dana setelah menyelesaikan tugas-tugas tertentu. baca juga:kode infogtk bagi guru yang sudah bisa menerima tpg tahap 1 baca juga:ini kode validasi yang menandakan tpg anda siap cair berikut cara kerjanya: - unduh aplikasi penghasil saldo seperti snack video, buzzbreak, atau cashpop dari google play store atau app store. - daftar menggunakan nomor ponsel atau akun media sosial. - selesaikan tugas yang diberikan untuk mengumpulkan poin. - tukarkan poin yang terkumpul dengan saldo dana setelah mencapai batas minimum. baca juga:jasad fadlan ditemukan mengapung 60 kilometer jauh dari lokasi tenggelam baca juga:done deal! sriwijaya fc tunjuk achmad zulkifli sebagai pelatih baru, siap berikan sentuhan magis di liga 2 dana kaget: saldo gratis dari link fitur dana kaget memungkinkan pengguna untuk mendapatkan saldo gratis melalui link yang dibagikan oleh teman atau grup komunitas. berikut cara mendapatkannya: - cari link dana kaget yang dibagikan melalui grup whatsapp, telegram, atau media sosial. - klik link tersebut dan login ke akun dana kamu. - saldo akan otomatis masuk ke akunmu jika kuota link masih tersedia. baca juga:polrestabes palembang gelar sholat ghoib untuk anggota polres way kanan yang gugur saat bertugas baca juga:sosok akp anumerta lusiyanto, kapolsek negara batin yang gugur dalam penggerebekan sabung ayam di way kanan pinjam saldo dana dari sesama pengguna selain fitur di atas, kamu juga bisa meminjam saldo dana dari sesama pengguna aplikasi dana. cara ini melibatkan teman atau keluarga yang juga menggunakan aplikasi dana. berikut cara meminjam saldo dana: - hubungi teman atau keluarga yang menggunakan dana. - jelaskan kebutuhanmu dan minta mereka mengirimkan saldo ke akunmu. - pastikan untuk mengembalikan saldo sesuai kesepakatan agar hubungan tetap terjaga. baca juga:kapendam ii sriwijaya, proses pencarian senjata yang digunakan dalam insiden penembakan di way kanan baca juga: sikap kompolnas, atas penembakan menewaskan 3 polisi saat penggerebekan judi sabung ayam di lampung tips penting dalam menggunakan saldo dana - gunakan dengan bijak ‚Äì pastikan saldo yang kamu pinjam digunakan untuk kebutuhan mendesak. - hindari penipuan ‚Äì gunakan aplikasi resmi dan hindari link atau aplikasi yang mencurigakan. - bayar tepat waktu ‚Äì jika meminjam dari teman atau keluarga, pastikan untuk mengembalikan saldo tepat waktu sesuai kesepakatan. dengan berbagai metode di atas, kamu dapat dengan mudah mendapatkan saldo dana sebesar rp50 ribu tanpa perlu menggunakan ktp. baca juga:pengecekan kualitas bbm dan tera di spbu lahat, bbm bersubsidi terjamin sesuai standar baca juga:duka cita polda sumsel: sholat ghaib dan bendera setengah tiang untuk 3 anggota polres way kanan yang gugur pilih cara yang paling sesuai dengan kebutuhanmu, dan gunakan saldo tersebut secara bijak!

title: Ternyata Ini Cara Isi Saldo via Akun DANA Bisnis
content: POSKOTA.CO.ID - Pengguna akun DANA Bisnis tidak perlu khawatir. Ada cara isi saldo lewat akun DANA Bisnis secara mudah dan cepat. DANA Bisnis merupakan fitur khusus pelaku usaha pada aplikasi e-wallet. Pelaku usaha, khususnya UMKM, dpat mengelola keuangan lewat fitur tersebut. Berkat fitur ini, urusan keuangan pribadi dan bisnis kamu dapat dibedakan, sehingga lebih tersusun, efisien, serta tidak mengganggu satu sama lain.

title: Perkuat Inklusivitas Pembayaran Digital, DANA Jadi Pelopor Fitur QRIS TAP
content: Vince Iswara, CEO & Co-Founder DANA Indonesia (kanan) mencoba fitur QRIS TAP di moda transportasi Transjakarta WARTAJOGLO, Jakarta - DANA kembali menunjukkan komitmennya sebagai pionir dalam inovasi keuangan digital dengan menjadi salah satu dompet digital pertama, yang mengimplementasikan fitur QRIS Tanpa Pindai (QRIS TAP). Fitur ini diinisiasi oleh Bank Indonesia (BI) sebagai upaya memperluas ekosistem pembayaran digital yang inklusif, aman, dan terjangkau bagi masyarakat. Peluncuran QRIS TAP juga sejalan dengan program Asta Cita Pemerintah yang bertujuan mendorong transformasi digital di berbagai sektor. QRIS TAP merupakan terobosan terbaru dalam sistem pembayaran digital di Indonesia. Fitur ini memanfaatkan teknologi Near Field Communication (NFC) yang sudah terintegrasi dalam ponsel pintar pengguna. Dengan QRIS TAP, proses pembayaran menjadi lebih cepat dan praktis karena pengguna tidak perlu lagi memindai kode QR. Cukup dengan membuka aplikasi DANA, mengetuk fitur QRIS TAP, dan mengarahkan ponsel ke terminal pembayaran merchant, transaksi pun selesai dalam hitungan detik. ‚ÄúQRIS merupakan salah satu terobosan terbaik dalam sistem pembayaran digital di Indonesia. Sejak awal kehadiran QRIS, kami senantiasa mendukung berbagai pengembangannya, mulai dari QRIS Cross Border hingga QRIS TAP. Kami percaya QRIS TAP akan mendorong inklusivitas pembayaran digital, mendekatkan masyarakat dengan transaksi nontunai untuk berbagai kebutuhan," ujar Vince Iswara, CEO & Co-Founder DANA Indonesia pada Senin 17 Maret 2025. Pada fase pertamanya, QRIS TAP di DANA dapat digunakan untuk pembayaran moda transportasi umum seperti Transjakarta dan Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) di berbagai kota seperti Jawa Barat, Surakarta, Banyumas, Banjarmasin, dan lainnya. Selain itu, fitur ini juga memudahkan pengguna untuk berbelanja di berbagai merchant ritel dan UMKM yang telah bekerja sama dengan DANA. Ke depannya, DANA berencana memperluas kapabilitas QRIS TAP hingga mencakup pembayaran untuk MRT Jakarta dan sektor lainnya. Salah satu keunggulan QRIS TAP di DANA adalah fokus pada keamanan dan kenyamanan bertransaksi. DANA telah mengamankan transaksi pengguna dengan berbagai lapisan proteksi, termasuk PIN, OTP, dan DANA VIZ, sehingga pengalaman pembayaran menjadi lebih mulus dan terjamin. Pengguna juga tidak perlu khawatir tentang kebocoran data pribadi, karena DANA terus meningkatkan edukasi keamanan melalui aplikasi dan media sosial. ‚ÄúKami terus memastikan perlindungan pengguna menjadi titik pusat inovasi kami. Dengan QRIS TAP, kami ingin memberikan pengalaman transaksi yang aman, nyaman, dan tepercaya bagi masyarakat,‚Äù tambah Vince. Menjelang libur Lebaran, DANA memproyeksikan peningkatan penggunaan QRIS TAP, terutama untuk pembayaran transportasi umum dan belanja ritel. Untuk mengantisipasi lonjakan pengguna, DANA telah menyiapkan serangkaian teknologi keamanan berlapis dan layanan pelanggan yang siap membantu 24/7. Perkuat Inklusivitas Pembayaran Digital, DANA Jadi Pelopor Fitur QRIS TAP https://t.co/RIor8fmA5L‚Äî ‚Äãüáº‚Äã‚Äãüá¶‚Äã‚Äãüá∑‚Äã‚Äãüáπ‚Äã‚Äãüá¶‚Äã‚ÄãüáØ‚Äã‚Äãüá¥‚Äã‚Äãüá¨‚Äã‚Äãüá±‚Äã‚Äãüá¥ (@wartajoglo) March 18, 2025 Hal ini bertujuan memastikan pengalaman bertransaksi pengguna tetap lancar dan nyaman, bahkan di tengah kepadatan aktivitas selama liburan. Sebelum QRIS TAP, DANA telah aktif terlibat dalam berbagai inisiatif pembayaran digital, seperti QRIS Cross Border yang menghubungkan Indonesia dengan Singapura, Thailand, dan Malaysia, serta Open API SNAP. Keterlibatan DANA dalam berbagai working group ini menunjukkan komitmennya untuk mendukung transformasi keuangan digital di Indonesia, sebagaimana tercantum dalam Blueprint Sistem Pembayaran Indonesia 2030. //Ril

title: DANA Hadirkan Fitur QRIS TAP: Bayar Apapun Jadi Lebih Mudah!
content: DANA kembali menghadirkan inovasi baru dalam dunia pembayaran digital dengan menjadi salah satu pelopor dompet digital yang menerapkan QRIS Tanpa Pindai (QRIS TAP). Dengan fitur ini, kamu bisa melakukan pembayaran hanya dengan menempelkan ponsel ke mesin pembayaran, tanpa perlu scan QR code seperti sebelumnya. QRIS TAP di DANA bisa digunakan untuk berbagai keperluan, mulai dari transportasi umum seperti Transjakarta dan BRT, hingga belanja di merchant yang sudah bekerja sama dengan DANA. Inovasi ini juga merupakan bagian dari upaya DANA untuk mendukung sistem pembayaran digital yang lebih inklusif dan efisien. Keunggulan QRIS TAP di DANA Sebagai salah satu yang pertama mengadopsi QRIS TAP, DANA menghadirkan berbagai keuntungan bagi penggunanya. Keamanan Transaksi Terjamin DANA memastikan setiap transaksi dengan fitur ini tetap aman. Sistem keamanan berlapis sudah diterapkan, termasuk PIN, OTP, dan DANA VIZ. Selain itu, DANA juga terus mengedukasi pengguna agar lebih waspada dalam menjaga data pribadi saat bertransaksi. Proses Pembayaran Lebih Cepat Dengan teknologi NFC, kamu tidak perlu lagi membuka kamera dan scan QR code. Cukup buka aplikasi DANA, pilih fitur QRIS TAP, lalu tempelkan ponsel ke mesin pembayaran. Transaksi selesai dalam hitungan detik. Bisa Digunakan untuk Transportasi Umum QRIS TAP kini bisa digunakan untuk membayar tiket Transjakarta dan Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) di berbagai kota seperti Jakarta, Surakarta, Banyumas, Banjarmasin, dan Jawa Barat. Ke depannya, fitur ini juga akan diperluas untuk MRT Jakarta. Bisa untuk Belanja di Merchant Selain transportasi, QRIS TAP juga bisa digunakan untuk berbelanja di berbagai merchant yang sudah bekerja sama dengan DANA. Mulai dari minimarket, restoran, hingga UMKM, semua bisa dibayar dengan lebih praktis. Sebagai penyedia dompet digital, DANA terus berinovasi agar masyarakat semakin terbiasa dengan transaksi digital yang cepat dan efisien. Dengan QRIS TAP, DANA ingin mendorong lebih banyak orang untuk beralih ke pembayaran nontunai yang lebih praktis. Selain itu, fitur ini mendukung program Asta Cita Pemerintah dalam membangun ekosistem pembayaran digital yang inklusif dan terjangkau. Melalui kerja sama dengan Bank Indonesia, pemerintah, dan penyedia layanan pembayaran lainnya, QRIS TAP diharapkan dapat semakin luas digunakan di berbagai sektor. Menjelang libur Lebaran, QRIS TAP bisa menjadi solusi pembayaran yang lebih cepat dan nyaman. Untuk mengantisipasi lonjakan pengguna, DANA telah menyiapkan teknologi keamanan tambahan dan layanan pelanggan yang siap membantu 24/7. Dengan begitu, pengguna tetap bisa bertransaksi dengan lancar tanpa kendala. Fitur ini menawarkan pengalaman pembayaran yang lebih cepat, aman, dan praktis. Tidak perlu lagi scan QR code, cukup tap dan bayar. Dengan fitur ini, transaksi menjadi lebih efisien untuk transportasi, belanja, hingga berbagai kebutuhan lainnya. Coba sekarang dan rasakan kemudahannya.

title: Wild Cash Game Online yang Menghasilkan Uang, Bisa Tarik ke Saldo Dana hingga Ovo
content: Suara.com - Wild Cash merupakan aplikasi menarik apabila kalian mencari game online yang menghasilkan uang. Hasil bermain game bahkan bisa dikonversi menjadi saldo Dana , OVO, GoPay, dan lain-lain. Seperti apa game penghasil uang ini? Sebagai referensi, Wild Cash merupakan aplikasi mobile resmi di HP Android. Game penghasil uang tersebut masuk dalam daftar 10 besar game kasual dan Trivia terbaik di Play Store. Mengingat Wild Cash terdaftar di Play Store, kalian tak perlu khawatir tentang keamanan hingga potensi penyusupan malware. Beberapa game penghasil uang atau saldo Dana diketahui tak terdaftar di Play Store sehingga keamanannya diragukan. Wild Cash besutan Hooked Technology berukuran sangat kecil yaitu 13 MB saja saat menginstal pertama kali. Sebagian besar resource-nya bahkan berukuran kurang dari 100 MB saja. " Mainkan game dengan Wild Cash untuk mendapatkan hadiah uang tunai? Wild Cash adalah aplikasi uang tunai yang mudah digunakan dan dibayar dengan baik untuk bermain game kapan saja, di mana saja. Yang harus Anda lakukan adalah memilih salah satu fitur di aplikasi untuk mendapatkan hadiah uang tunai! Menambang, kuis menyenangkan, mengundang teman Anda untuk bermain dengan Anda.Semua fitur ini tersedia dalam satu aplikasi - Wild Cash! " tulis developer melalui laman resmi. Wild Cash, game penghasil saldo DANA dan OVO. (Play Store) Game Casual tersebut sangat populer dengan jumlah download melebihi 5 juta kali. Wild Casual memperoleh ulasan 3,6 dari 5 bintang tersedia. Review positif biasanya datang dari pembuktian player yang bisa menarik saldo Dana memanfaatkan hasil game. Meski begitu, tak sedikit pemain yang memberikan ulasan negatif mengingat penghasilan uangnya membutuhkan waktu lama dan kesabaran tingkat tinggi. Wild Cash termasuk permainan online dengan gameplay sederhana. Kalian hanya perlu melakukan tap-tap untuk melakukan simulasi penambangan koin. Ini mirip dengan game tap-tap populer di Telegram. Player juga dapat menyelesaikan kuis untuk menghasilkan sejumlah koin. Setiap pemain mempunyai kondisi berbeda-beda terkait jumlah penarikan awal saldo Dana. Namun player rata-rata mampu menarik uang senilai Rp 8.500. Baca Juga: Cara Top Up DANA Lewat Alfamart Tanpa Potongan Perolehan 50 ribu koin dapat ditarik menjadi saldo Rp 500. Ini membuat kalian perlu bersabar untuk menghasilkan uang. Pemain dapat menjawab beragam kuis sederhana di Kamp Pelatihan sehingga peluang penarikan saldo lebih besar. Ilustrasi DANA. (Dana.id) Fitur mengajak teman dan menabung juga bisa menghasilkan uang tambahan. " Ini sangat mudah! Yang terpenting, pengguna Wild Cash dapat secara otomatis mendapatkan 10.000 GOLD per hari dengan menambang dengan satu klik! Mencari tantangan intelektual? Ingin menghasilkan uang dengan pengetahuan? Nyalakan fitur kuis seru dan dapatkan 100 persen benar dalam kuis untuk memenangkan kumpulan hadiah $1 Miliar! " klaim developer. Game online yang menghasilkan uang ini menuai beragam komentar dari para pemain. " Gamenya sangat bagus, selain menghasilkan uang gamenya juga seru dan gampang. Cukup masuk ke game dan menambang sebentar, ada kuisnya juga sangat melatih otak ," tulis M**t*kim. " Buat dapat 8k dibutuhkan 800.000 poin. Kira-kira butuh berapa bulan buat dapatin 8k? Apa nggak jebol jempolmu kalau tap-tap layar terus, HP pun bisa rusak ini, " kritik Pr**at P**yer. " Saya kasih bintang 3 dulu untuk aplikasi ini. Game seru, ada kuisnya, soal-soal pun gampang-gaampang susah. Bisa menambah wawasan dan mengasah otak. Tapi saya main sudah hampir 2 tahun. Saldo lama banget naik ," pendapat F**ry M**lana. Itulah tadi penjelasan mengenai game online yang menghasilkan uang, akses resmi Play Store bisa diklik melalui LINK INI.

title: Umbrella Mizuno Double Layer Manual
content: Jika ada pilihan warna atau ukuran WAJIB mencantumkan dalam kolom keterangan saat pemesanan. Bila tidak akan dikirim secara random oleh kami Pesanan melalui JNE, Si Cepat, JnT yang masuk sebelum jam 10.00 (Senin-Jumat) akan dikirim hari itu juga. Pesanan (Go-send, Grab, Ninja ) yang masuk sebelum 14:30 akan dikirimkan pada hari yang sama. Jika lebih dari jam yang ditentukan tersebut akan diproses dikirim esok harinya Hari Minggu/Libur Umum kami tutup. Hari Sabtu buka sampai jam 15:00 WIB. Pesanan pada hari Minggu atau libur, akan diproses secepatnya setelah toko buka kembali. Kami tidak bertanggung jawab apabila terjadi kehilangan pada pesanan yang diakibatkan oleh kelalaian kurir ekspedisi. Untuk keamanan paket silahkan menambahkan opsi tambahan bayaran asuransi. Keterlambatan dalam pengiriman setelah barang diserahkan ke expedisi adalah tanggung jawab ekspedisi. Terimakasih dan selamat berbelanja..

title: BONUSAN! Klaim Saldo DANA Gratis Rp550.000 Malam Ini!
content: Saldo DANA gratis dari klaim link DANA Kaget hari ini Selasa, 18 Maret 2025. (Dok. Haijkarta.id) Hari ini, pada 18 Maret 2025, pengguna DANA berkesempatan mendapatkan saldo gratis sebesar Rp550.000 melalui klaim link DANA Kaget. Kesempatan ini menarik perhatian banyak pengguna dompet digital di Indonesia, terutama bagi mereka yang mencari cara mudah untuk memperoleh uang tanpa investasi awal yang besar. Saldo gratis ini dapat diakses hanya dengan menggunakan ponsel yang terhubung dengan internet. Dalam era digital saat ini, pengguna internet tidak hanya bisa melihat konten, tetapi juga bisa mendapatkan keuntungan di bidang finansial. Dompet digital, seperti DANA, menyediakan platform yang memudahkan transaksi dan menawarkan fitur-fitur yang menarik, salah satunya adalah DANA Kaget. DANA Kaget menjadi salah satu fitur yang banyak diminati, di mana pengguna dapat mengklaim saldo hanya dengan mengklik link yang disebarluaskan di berbagai platform sosial media seperti X (Twitter) dan Facebook. Biasanya, link ini dibagikan oleh pengguna lain yang berhasil mendapatkan saldo tersebut. Untuk bisa memanfaatkan promo ini, ada beberapa langkah yang harus diikuti. Pastikan semua data sesuai dan pilih ‚ÄúSubmit‚Äù. Setelah akun terverifikasi, langkah berikutnya adalah mencari link DANA Kaget. Pengguna disarankan untuk mencarinya secara aktif di platform media sosial. Penting untuk memilih link yang resmi, yaitu yang menggunakan domain https://link.dana.id. Link ini hanya dapat diakses dalam waktu 1√ó24 jam dengan kuota yang terbatas, yaitu antara 2-200 pengguna. Setelah menemukan link, pengguna dapat melanjutkan dengan mengklik link atau memindai kode QR yang tersedia. Jika saldo masih tersedia, pengguna akan diarahkan ke aplikasi DANA untuk mengklaim saldo ke dompet digital mereka. Proses ini memberikan pengalaman yang cepat dan sederhana bagi pengguna yang ingin mendapatkan uang tambahan. Namun, dalam dunia digital yang penuh dengan peluang, selalu ada risiko penipuan yang mengintai. Oleh karena itu, sangat penting bagi pengguna DANA untuk tetap waspada agar tidak menjadi korban modus penipuan. Berikut adalah beberapa tips untuk menghindari penipuan saldo DANA gratis palsu: Edukasi Diri: Selalu perbarui informasi mengenai modus penipuan yang marak terjadi di dunia digital, terutama yang berkaitan dengan dompet digital. Jangan Berikan Informasi Pribadi: Hindari berbagi data pribadi seperti kode OTP atau password kepada pihak manapun, termasuk yang mengaku dari customer service DANA. Aktifkan Verifikasi Dua Langkah: Langkah ini akan memberikan perlindungan ekstra dengan mengirimkan notifikasi ketika ada upaya login dari perangkat baru. Periksa Keaslian Link: Sebelum mengklik link, pastikan untuk memverifikasi keasliannya agar terhindar dari tautan berbahaya. Peluang untuk mendapatkan saldo gratis dari DANA Kaget adalah kesempatan bagi banyak orang untuk menambah pemasukan dengan cara yang sederhana. Namun, selalu ingat untuk berhati-hati dan mengikuti langkah yang tepat agar pengalaman ini tetap aman dan bermanfaat. Dengan memanfaatkan dompet digital secara bijak dan cerdas, pengguna dapat mendapatkan manfaat lebih dari kemajuan teknologi yang ada saat ini. Dimas HarsonoSelasa, 18 Maret 2025 11:40 PM

title: AnyMind Group Launches Asia E
content: This is the inaugural report for the Asia E-Commerce Landscape Report, and third installment of this e-commerce report series by AnyMind Group This report unveils the most popular e-commerce platforms in Asia‚Äôs key markets, helping Indian brands to grow and expand in other regions of Asia India, 17th March, 2025: AnyMind Group [TSE:5027], a BPaaS company for marketing, e-commerce and digital transformation, has released its inaugural Asia E-Commerce Landscape Report. This report unveils the most popular e-commerce platforms in Asia‚Äôs key markets, helping Indian brands to grow and expand in other regions of Asia. The report highlights the most popular e-commerce platforms in major East and Southeast Asian markets, such as Shopee, Lazada, Zalora, and Rakuten. It also examines leading social commerce platforms, including TikTok Shop, LINE, and Xiaohongshu, providing valuable insights for brands and businesses to seize opportunities and stay updated in this rapidly evolving digital economy. Asia‚Äôs e-commerce market is experiencing remarkable growth, driven by technological advancements and shifting consumer behaviors. This report compiles insights from leading data platforms, spotlighting the most popular e-commerce platforms among local consumers across East Asia (Japan, China, South Korea, Hong Kong, Taiwan) and Southeast Asia (Vietnam, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore). This is the third report by AnyMind Group in its e-commerce report series, the first two being Southeast Asia E-Commerce Landscape report and the East Asia E-Commerce Landscape report. Key highlights of the Asia E-Commerce Landscape Report are: In East Asia, e-commerce platforms are highly diverse, featuring both global and local players. Japan: Amazon leads the market, followed closely by Rakuten and Yahoo Shopping. The entry of Temu in 2023 saw rapid growth for the platform, introducing a new major player to the market. China: Giants like Taobao, Douyin, Pinduoduo, Xiaohongshu, and JD.com dominate the landscape, with content-driven e-commerce quickly catching up to traditional models. South Korea: Coupang maintains a commanding 61% market share, renowned for its fast delivery services. Meanwhile, Naver, integrating multiple services, has become a key gateway for online shoppers, reflecting consumer demand for convenience and centralized information. Southeast Asia‚Äôs e-commerce market thrives on mobile-first strategies, fueled by consumer reliance on mobile devices. The line between social networking and shopping continues to blur, driving the rise of social commerce: Shopee: Dominates in Vietnam, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, and the Philippines, maintaining its leadership position. Lazada: Leverages strong logistics services and AI technologies to enhance the customer experience, securing its position as the second-largest e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia. TikTok Shop: Combines short videos, live streaming, and e-commerce to create an engaging, entertainment-driven shopping experience. It has gained immense popularity among younger consumers, emerging as a major online shopping platform in markets such as Indonesia, Thailand, and Vietnam, posing strong competition to traditional e-commerce players. Link to download report: https://anymindgroup.com/report/asia-e-commerce-landscape-2025 Tags: agencyAnyMindmarketingreport

title: Hanabishi Wins Big at Shopee Brands Summer 2025 Awards ‚Äì The Voice Newsweekly
content: Hanabishi Appliances has emerged as the leader in the small appliances category at the Shopee Brands Summer 2025 Awards, securing 41,476 votes or 36% of the total from verified users on the platform. This prestigious recognition as one of Shopee‚Äôs Favorites highlights the trust and loyalty Hanabishi has earned among Filipino consumers. ‚ÄúWe are deeply grateful to our customers for this incredible support,‚Äù said Cherish Ong-Chua, VP for Marketing and Finance of Hanabishi. ‚ÄúThis award means so much because it comes directly from those who trust and use our products.‚Äù The award cements Hanabishi‚Äôs status as a top choice for affordable and reliable home and kitchen appliances in the Philippines. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre committed to creating products that make household tasks easier, allowing our customers more quality time with their families or to pursue their passions,‚Äù Ong-Chua added. Looking ahead to its 40th anniversary next year, Hanabishi promises even more innovative products, exciting collaborations, and exclusive promotions. Hanabishi is also nominated for the Best Home Appliance category at the VP Choice Awards. To vote, visit the official site. For more updates, visit the Hanabishi Official Store on Shopee and follow their social media channels for the latest products and promotions.

title: vivo V50 Unveiled: A Closer Look at Its Camera, Display, Battery, and IP69 Rating
content: The smartphone market is constantly evolving, and the vivo V50 introduces a set of features designed for those who value photography, design, battery life, and durability. With ZEISS Professional Portrait capabilities, a quad-curved display, a slim design housing a 6000mAh BlueVolt battery, and IP68/IP69 water and dust resistance, the V50 brings together various elements in a compact form. Photography with ZEISS Professional Portrait The vivo V50‚Äôs ZEISS Professional Portrait system includes a 50MP ZEISS OIS main camera, which aims to deliver enhanced depth, sharpness, and natural colour reproduction. The Multifocal Length Portrait Mode allows users to switch between different focal lengths, offering flexibility in framing portraits. At 23mm, the wider field of view captures more of the background, making it ideal for environmental portraits that tell a story. Switching to 35mm offers a balanced perspective, often used in street photography and candid portraits. This focal length provides a natural look without excessive distortion, keeping the subject in sharp focus while maintaining context in the background. For those looking for a more classic portrait style, the 50mm focal length creates a flattering compression effect, drawing attention to facial features while blurring the background. This is often the preferred choice for headshots and close-up portraits, as it isolates the subject beautifully without exaggerating facial proportions. The phone‚Äôs AI-powered enhancements adjust facial features, optimise lighting, and refine skin tones while maintaining a true-to-life look. Additionally, optical image stabilisation (OIS) helps reduce blurriness, particularly in low-light environments. Compact Elegant Design The equal-depth quad-curved screen on the vivo V50 is designed to offer a seamless transition from the display to the frame, contributing to a more immersive viewing experience. The OLED panel delivers deep blacks, vibrant colours, and high contrast, which can enhance video playback and gaming visuals. With a high refresh rate of 120Hz, scrolling and animations appear smoother, which can be particularly noticeable in fast-paced gaming or social media browsing. The materials used in the construction give the device a refined look and feel, making it suitable for both professional and casual settings while the curved edges make the device more comfortable to hold. Massive battery, long life One of the standout features of the vivo V50 is its 6000mAh BlueVolt battery, designed to provide extended usage without frequent recharging. The large capacity is particularly beneficial for those who rely on their phones for heavy multitasking, streaming, and gaming. Despite housing a high-capacity battery, the slim profile of the V50 remains a key aspect of its design. The BlueVolt battery technology is also designed to optimise power efficiency and heat management, which may contribute to improved battery lifespan. For charging, the vivo V50 supports 90W fast charging, getting you back in the game quickly. Durability with IP68/IP69 Resistance The vivo V50 is IP68/IP69 certified, which means that the device is designed to withstand exposure to dust and water. This level of durability could be beneficial in scenarios such as accidental spills or splashes, use in humid or rainy conditions, and protection from dust when travelling or working outdoors. Experience the vivo V50 Today The vivo V50 brings together a combination of camera technology, display design, battery capacity, and durability. Its range of features caters to those looking for a smartphone that balances photography, aesthetics, longevity, and resilience. With its ZEISS Professional Portrait system, quad-curved OLED display, high-capacity battery, and IP-rated durability, the V50 positions itself as an option for those who value both functionality and design in a smartphone. Pre-ordering the vivo V50 comes with several added perks, including complimentary gifts and savings worth up to RM1,335. Those who place their orders early will receive a compact 18‚Äù luggage along with a pair of vivo Buds. Additionally, those opting for the 512GB variant are eligible for a RM100 rebate. The device also comes with vivo care+, which includes 1+1 years of extended warranty. Beyond the standard offers, customers can also take advantage of a 30% discount on the vivo Watch 3. For those trading in their old devices, vivo is offering up to RM400 in additional trade-in savings. Flexible payment options are available as well, with 0% interest instalment plans starting at RM83.30 per month. Additionally, purchases made using SPayLater qualify for a 15% discount, capped at RM100. These offers are available for a limited time, with the pre-order period running until 21st March 2025. Check out the vivo V50 today on the vivo eStore, Shopee, or Lazada.

title: Huge foreign transactions; net buy 393 million shares
content: More Info! JAKARTA ‚Äì On Monday, March 18, foreign investor transactions on the Indonesia Stock Exchange continued to close favorably with a net buy. Foreign net buy transactions have grown to 393.51 million shares from 126.99 million shares on the previous trading day. The number of international purchases and sales today is significantly higher than it was on the previous trading day, March 17. 6.50 billion shares were purchased by foreign buyers today, representing the total volume of foreign buys. Today, foreign investors registered a net buy of 393.51 million shares, with a sales volume (foreign sell) of 6.10 billion shares. With a net buy of 695.14 million shares, PT GOTO Gojek Tokopedia Tbk (GOTO) shares are the most purchased of the day. With 3.07 billion shares bought and 2.37 billion shares sold, this digital service issuer has a sizable number of overseas transactions. A net buy of 138.64 million shares of PT Bumi Resources Tbk (BUMI) was then made. About 171.24 million shares of this mining holding company were sold by foreign investors, who purchased 309.89 million shares. After foreigners purchased 67.83 million shares and sold about 6.5 million shares of this oil and gas tanker issuer, PT Buana Lintas Lautan Tbk (BULL) shares came next with a net buy of 61.31 million shares. The top buy list was then closed by technology issuer PT Wir Asia Tbk (WIRG) and telecommunications issuer PT Smartfren Telecom Tbk (FREN), with a net buy of 33.33 million WIRG and 35.94 million FREN. About 42 million shares were purchased by foreigners in FREN, while 5.35 million shares were sold. Meanwhile, WIRG's foreign buy volume was approximately 50.54 million shares, while its selling volume was 17.20 million. However, the majority of today's top sell list was made up of shares from banking issuers. With a net sell of 182.08 million shares, PT Bank Central Asia Tbk (BBCA) is in first place. 354.22 million shares of the private bank were sold, and 172.14 million were purchased by foreigners. Following with net sell volumes of 140.14 million BMRI and 95.91 million BBRI were two national banks: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk (BMRI) and PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk (BBRI). BMRI's foreign buying volume was 132.61 million, whereas its selling volume totaled 272.76 million. Meanwhile, BBRI's buying volume was 174.10 million with a selling volume of 270.02 million shares. With a net sell of over 78 million shares, nickel mining issuer PT Merdeka Battery Materials Tbk (MBMA) and e-commerce shares of PT Bukalapak.com Tbk (BUKA) concluded the list of top sellers. Foreigners purchased as many as 49.41 million MBMA shares and sold as many as 126.42 million, while they sold 121.31 million BUKA shares and only purchased 43.24 million. (KD) Find the latest net foreign news at IDNFinancials.com! net foreign top five sell buy investor march 2025 trading halt net buy Share: Latest News

title: Service Quality Lead
content: Apply for this job About the Role We are looking for a Manager to oversee the delivery and execution of quality and training initiatives within our support operations. This role will focus on ensuring compliance with service and quality metrics while continuously driving improvements in both internal and outsourced contact center teams. The Service Quality Lead will manage quality assurance processes, analyze performance data, and implement strategic initiatives that optimize overall service delivery. Additionally, the role will involve developing and executing targeted training programs to support agent performance and enhance customer interactions. What You Will Do Service Quality Management: Lead and manage the end-to-end delivery of quality initiatives within both the local and outsourced contact center, ensuring strict adherence to service and quality standards. Monitor and measure key compliance, performance, and quality metrics to ensure the highest level of service is consistently delivered. Quality Strategy Development: Design and implement a comprehensive Service Quality strategy, framework, and standards, aligning with business goals and customer expectations. Define and manage quality improvement initiatives across both internal teams and outsourced BPO operations. Quality Analysis & Improvement: Conduct detailed quality assessments, identify performance gaps, and lead root cause analysis to develop actionable insights. Collaborate closely with the operations team to drive continuous quality improvement across the support operations. Process Streamlining & Standardization: Collaborate with Care team members and other stakeholders to identify and streamline processes. Implement standard procedures and best practices that enhance both service delivery and the overall user experience. Training & Development: Identify training needs based on quality performance gaps and support the creation of targeted training programs. Ensure training initiatives are aligned with organizational goals and continuously enhance agent effectiveness. Focus on developing a high-performing contact center team. Project Leadership & Pilot Programs: Initiate, lead, and guide small- to medium-scale projects, including the pilot implementation of new platforms or tool functionalities aimed at enhancing training and moderation quality. Care Team & Contact Center Strategy: Support and promote the development of the Care team and Contact Center strategy, ensuring the business delivery model is customer-oriented, efficient, effective, and compliant, while achieving business goals.What You Will Need At least 3 years of experience in service quality, quality assurance, or similar roles within a contact center environment. Proven leadership experience in managing teams within a contact or customer service center, including both internal and outsourced teams. Deep understanding of quality assurance frameworks and best practices for both vendor and in-house customer service operations. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess performance data, identify issues, and drive actionable improvements in service quality. Proven ability in stakeholder management and the ability to collaborate across teams to achieve business and quality objectives. Project management experience, with a track record of leading quality and training initiatives in a fast-paced contact center or BPO setting. Experience in developing and implementing quality assurance and training solutions, ideally within the tech industry, is a strong advantage. Certifications in ACTA (Advanced Certificate in Training and Assessment) or Quality Management (such as Six Sigma or ISO certification) would be a bonusAbout the Team The Service Excellence team is a unit within the broader Gojek Singapore team that handles end-to-end support for our driver-partners and customers. We partner with the operations and product teams to provide a seamless experience throughout our user‚Äôs service journeys, and constantly strive to make things better. As a team, we're concerned not only with the growth of the company, but each other's personal growth and well-being, too. While we haven‚Äôt physically gathered everyone together in awhile (we‚Äôre a pretty big group!), we make sure to stay connected through virtual Lark parties, online games, and occasional (surprise) deliveries. About GoTo GroupGoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to ‚ÄúEmpower Progress‚Äô by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia‚Äôs vast consumer household. About Gojek Gojek is Southeast Asia‚Äôs leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market. About GoTo FinancialGoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last. GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels. #LI-ONSITE Apply for this job Stats for this job Salaries The number of jobs in each salary range for all:

title: Grab Is Said to Move Forward With Talks to Buy Rival GoTo (2)
content: Grab Holdings Ltd. is moving forward with its attempt to take over GoTo Group, according to people familiar with the matter, who said the Singaporean ride and delivery firm has begun due diligence on its Indonesian rival. Grab has been evaluating GoTo‚Äôs accounts, contracts and operations, the people said, asking not to be identified because the companies haven‚Äôt announced a deal. Grab, GoTo and their shareholders have also been assessing the potential structure and value of an agreement, the people said. Talks are ongoing and may not lead to a transaction, the people said.
